akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3b. Repealed. Pub. L. 113–287, § 7, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3272
Section, Pub. L. 87–608, Aug. 24, 1962, 76 Stat. 405, related to maintenance and repair of Government improvements under concession contracts.
Editorial Notes Codification Section was classified to section 303c of former Title 40, prior to the enactment of Title 40, Public Buildings, Property, and Works, by Pub. L. 107–217, § 1, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1062.
